sentences.en: According to one employee, who wishes to remain anonymous , the company engaged in illegal activities.
sentences.cn: 根据一位不愿透露姓名的员工所述，这家公司曾从事非法活动。

sentences.en: An anonymous caller told police what had happened.
sentences.cn: 有人打匿名电话向警方报告了所发生的事。

sentences.en: Anonymous figures strayed along the banks of the ornamental lakes.
sentences.cn: 不知名的人们沿着点缀风景的小湖堤岸悠然徜徉.

sentences.en: But I never stopped imagining who the anonymous giver might be.
sentences.cn: 但是,我对谁是匿名送花人的猜测从未停止过.

sentences.en: By Federation rules, all sponsors must remain anonymous - for their own protection.
sentences.cn: 根据协会的规章,为了避免麻烦, 所有资助人必须隐名.

sentences.en: He was surprised by the venomous tone of the anonymous calls.
sentences.cn: 那些匿名电话的恶毒语气很令他吃惊。

sentences.en: It's nice to stay in a home rather than in an anonymous holiday villa.
sentences.cn: 呆在家里比呆在单调乏味的度假别墅里要惬意得多。

sentences.en: Of course, that would have to be by anonymous vote.
sentences.cn: 当然，那必须通过不记名投票的方式。

sentences.en: She's got too much dignity to descend to writing anonymous letters.
sentences.cn: 她是个自尊心很强的人，绝不会自贬身份去写匿名信。

sentences.en: the anonymous author of a collection of poems
The man was arrested after an anonymous tip-off.
sentences.cn: 有人匿名举报后，那个人被抓了起来。

sentences.en: The money was donated by a local businessman who wishes to remain anonymous .
sentences.cn: 这笔款子是当地一位不愿透露姓名的企业家捐赠的。

sentences.en: The one about the anonymous letter. "
sentences.cn: 就是那封讲起匿名信的信. ”

sentences.en: The president is said to receive an anonymous letter yesterday.
sentences.cn: 听说总裁昨天收到一封匿名信.

sentences.en: To be part of this crucial anonymous work satisfied him.
sentences.cn: 参与这个左右全局的默默无闻的工作使他感到满足.

sentences.en: You can remain anonymous if you wish.
sentences.cn: 你愿意的话可以不透露姓名。

phrases.tran_cn: 匿名戒酒互助社；慝名戒毒会

trans.tran_cn: 匿名的，不知名的，不记名的，没有特色的
